issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: Changes scratch direction, check your configuration if the scratch location is important to you.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: SessionState.start creates a temp file for temp results, but this file is created in hive.querylog.location, which supposed to be used only for hive history log files.
fields.summary: SessionState temp file gets created in history file directory

comments.body: Changed the SessionState temp file location to local scratch directory.
